text: Hannes Olof Gösta Alfvén (; 30 May 1908 – 2 April 1995) was a Swedish electrical engineer and plasma physicist. He was the winner of the 1970 Nobel Prize in Physics for his work on magnetohydrodynamics (MHD). ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Swedish physicists Category:Electrical engineers
title: Hannes Alfvén
